mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ENTER_DATE) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE ENTER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date1},'YY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{date2},'YY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(MODIFY_DATE) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MODIFY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date1},'YY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{date2},'YY-MM-DD') AND USER_STATUS = 'N'
